subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Same stupid nasty negative BS!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks. It's not just the boxes, these "rational thinkers" want all free
thinking to go away. That is what I find so infuriating. It's all this pure
science BS, how many thousands die every year from drugs tested by good
science, how many die every year being denied treatments that work because
it goes against science. How long did cigarette companies rely on good
science to show smoking is good for you. You can get any result you pay for
with science. Science is nothing but dogma and egos--in this society.

 I could understand someone saying they tested to boxes and all they heard
was broadcast fragments, or gibberish, or a mix of the above along --with
some stuff that is not supposed to be there. But to just flat out claim they
hear nothing!, what? are they frikkin' deaf!? Two ways to hear nothing, put
the broken radio in a faraday cage, blocking all signals, or never turn the
thing on! It's the ignore all facts and statements of live witnesses, stuff
that stands up in any court, and then claim they are somehow superior.
That's the freaking NAZIs, the darkside, pure evil!

 F-S

april@...> wrote:

>
>
> You have nothing to worry about there Frank. There isn't anything anyone

> else that there isn't anything to the ghost boxes, would that matter to you?
> It certainly shouldn't.
>
>

>>
>>
>> No. It's the dorks that try to claim scientific testing to make something
>> like the boxes go away, despite the fact the countless users get verifiable
>> information almost daily through the box, and yet these crackheads
>> deny-deny-deny!! Need I remind anyone how many times "science" has been
>> wrong--over and over and over--it's a freaking useless discipline, all it
>> does is build egos!
>>
>>  Frank-S
>>

>>>  It's probably not kosher to post this, but I find this highly insulting
>>> to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and all other methods, such as
>>> EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside the computer. Ignore all phone
>>> EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no electronic aids. Ignore
>>> messages received via turned off TV and printers--and on and on, yet they
>>> know all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably thousands use boxes
>>> successfully.
>>>
>>> "We have conducted a few listening studies of reported radio-sweep EVP
>>> and the results have not been good. We have also worked with a variety of
>>> such devices. Based on what we know about trans-etheric influences, how EVP
>>> and visual forms of ITC are formed and what we know about mediumship, it is
>>> difficult to fit radio-sweep into any established hypothesis. Without solid
>>> research supporting it as producing EVP, it is impossible for us to
>>> recommend it or support its use. If there were double-blind studies
>>> conducted by experienced researchers that shows it does produce phenomena,
>>> we would gladly promote it as an alternative technique.
>>>
>>> We are pretty sure that, in transform EVP (ordinary recorder), the voice
>>> is formed in the electronics by transforming available audio-frequency noise
>>> in an active part of the electronics such as a transistor junction. We think
>>> the process is amplification of a weak telekinetic signal via stochastic
>>> resonance and we have found that the optimum audio-frequency signal for this
>>> is a chaotic one rich in voice-frequencies with many transient perturbation.
>>> That is our working hypothesis. "
>>>
>>>  I can't say who this is from, cuz almost certain I'd get sued. There's
>>> no double blind testing their BS either. Clueless!!
>>>
>>>  F-S
>>>
